name: Armorer
description: Armorers modify arcane armor to protect allies or strike with stealth and precision.

3.name: Arcane Armor
3.description: You gain a magical suit of armor that replaces missing limbs and integrates weapons.

3.name: Armor Model
3.description: You choose between the Guardian or Infiltrator armor model.

3.name: Armorer Spells
3.description: You always have certain spells prepared at specific artificer levels.

5.name: Extra Attack
5.description: You can attack twice, instead of once, when you take the Attack action.

9.name: Armor Modifications
9.description: You can infuse your armor with additional magical effects.

15.name: Perfected Armor
15.description: Your armor gains additional powerful effects based on its model.
